linrois.angdeg: linearity roi_0: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
linrois.radmm: linearity roi_0: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

linrois.angdeg: linearity roi_1: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
linrois.radmm: linearity roi_1: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

linrois.angdeg: linearity roi_2: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
linrois.cutdiammm: linearity roi_2: diameter of roi around insert position to look for shifted object center (mm)
linrois.radmm: linearity roi_2: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)
linrois.thresh_lo: linearity roi_2: minimum value when looking for insert (HU)

linrois.angdeg: linearity roi_3: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
linrois.diam_maxmm: linearity roi_3: maximum diameter of ring shaped roi (mm)
linrois.diam_minmm: linearity roi_3: minimum diameter of ring shaped roi (mm)
linrois.radmm: linearity roi_3: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

noiserois.angdeg: noise roi_0: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
noiserois.radmm: noise roi_0: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

phantom.thresh_lo: minimal value when looking for phantom (HU)

unifrois.angdeg: uniformity roi_0: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
unifrois.radmm: uniformity roi_0: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

unifrois.angdeg: uniformity roi_1: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
unifrois.radmm: uniformity roi_1: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)

unifrois.angdeg: uniformity roi_2: angular position of roi center wrt phantom center (degrees)
unifrois.radmm: uniformity roi_2: radial position of roi center from phantom center (mm)
